name: StoneCraft (SpaceBeanFrancis)
description:
Another Friday Night Game Jam submission made in 3 hours. The theme this time is "Stone Age". This was a fun one, enjoy! I would love to hear the feedbacks from you. Please check out my other games as well, and if you like what you see do follow me for more upcoming games!

Trying to survive and collect feathers for your girl friend. Craft tools to  help you along the way. Swords are good against animals, Pickaxes are good for destroying stones and Axes are good for cutting trees. You can only carry one tool at a time so use them wisely.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Use: Mouse Left
